alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 8:56PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau affecting Webster, Bienville, Bossier and Red River Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 142.5 feet, Expect some minor flooding of low area camps, however, all access roadways will remain open. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 142.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening and continue rising to 142.5 feet Friday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 142.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued Wednesday Morning 1000 AM CDT.
